Verses: 1 allelooyaa, Dhevanai Avarudaiya Parisuththa Sthalaththil Thudhiyungal; Avarudaiya Vallamai Vilangum Aagaaya Virivaippaarththu Avaraith Thudhiyungal.
2 avarudaiya Vallamaiyulla Kiriyaigalukkaaga Avaraith Thudhiyungal; Maatchimai Porundhiya Avarudaiya Magaththuvaththirkaaga Avaraith Thudhiyungal.
3 ekkaala Dhoniyode Avaraith Thudhiyungal; Veenaiyodum Suramandalaththodum Avaraith Thudhiyungal.
4 thamburodum Nadanaththodum Avaraith Thudhiyungal; Yaazhodum Theenguzhalodum Avaraith Thudhiyungal.
5 osaiyulla Kaiththaalangalodum Avaraith Thudhiyungal; Perosaiyulla Kaiththaalangalodum Avaraith Thudhiyungal.
